Abstract base class for vector database clients.

abstract async aget_chunk(query: str, with_score: bool = False, top_k: int | None = None) → List[Document] | List[Tuple[Document, float]][source]

Returns the most similar chunks from the vector database (asynchronous).

Parameters:

  • query – A query string

  • with_score – Outputs scores of returned chunks

  • top_k – Number of top similar chunks to return, if None defaults to self.top_k

Returns:

list of Documents

abstract delete() → None[source]

Delete all chunks in the vector database.

Chroma Client

Class for Chroma vector database.

This module provides: - ChromaClient

class grag.components.vectordb.chroma_client.ChromaClient(host: str = 'localhost', port: str = '8000', collection_name: str = 'arxiv', embedding_type: str = 'instructor-embedding', embedding_model: str = 'hkunlp/instructor-xl')[source]

Bases: VectorDB

A class for connecting to a hosted Chroma Vectorstore collection.

host[source]

str IP Address of hosted Chroma Vectorstore

port[source]

str port address of hosted Chroma Vectorstore

collection_name[source]

str name of the collection in the Chroma Vectorstore, each ChromaClient connects to a single collection

embedding_type[source]

str type of embedding used, supported ‘sentence-transformers’ and ‘instructor-embedding’

embedding_model[source]

str model name of embedding used, should correspond to the embedding_type

embedding_function[source]

a function of the embedding model, derived from the embedding_type and embedding_modelname

client[source]

chromadb.HttpClient Chroma API for client

collection[source]

Chroma API for the collection

langchain_client[source]

langchain_community.vectorstores.Chroma LangChain wrapper for Chroma collection

  • verbose – Show progress bar

Returns:

None

add_docs(docs: List[Document], verbose=True) → None[source]

  • verbose – Show progress bar

Returns:

None

async aget_chunk(query: str, with_score=False, top_k=None) → List[Document] | List[Tuple[Document, float]][source]

Returns the most (cosine) similar chunks from the vector database, asynchronously.

Parameters:

  • query – A query string

  • with_score – Outputs scores of returned chunks

  • top_k – Number of top similar chunks to return, if None defaults to self.top_k

Returns:

list of Documents

delete() → None[source]

Delete all the chunks in the database collection.

get_chunk(query: str, with_score: bool = False, top_k: int | None = None) → List[Document] | List[Tuple[Document, float]][source]

Returns the most similar chunks from the chroma database.

Parameters:

  • query – A query string

  • with_score – Outputs scores of returned chunks

  • top_k – Number of top similar chunks to return, if None defaults to self.top_k

Returns:

list of Documents

test_connection(verbose=True) → int[source]

Tests connection with Chroma Vectorstore.

Parameters:

verbose – if True, prints connection status

Returns:

A random integer if connection is alive else None

Deeplake Client

class grag.components.vectordb.deeplake_client.DeepLakeClient(collection_name: str = 'arxiv', store_path: str | Path = '/home/ubuntu/volume_2k/Capstone_5/data/vectordb', embedding_type: str = 'instructor-embedding', embedding_model: str = 'hkunlp/instructor-xl', read_only: bool = False)[source]

Bases: VectorDB

A class for connecting to a DeepLake Vectorstore.

store_path[source]

str, Path The path to store the DeepLake vectorstore.

embedding_type[source]

str type of embedding used, supported ‘sentence-transformers’ and ‘instructor-embedding’

embedding_model[source]

str model name of embedding used, should correspond to the embedding_type

embedding_function[source]

a function of the embedding model, derived from the embedding_type and embedding_modelname

deeplake.core.vectorstore.VectorStore DeepLake API

collection[source]

Chroma API for the collection
